content: why would you crochet your own washcloth when you can buy a flannel well they re easy and quick to make making them ideal projects for craft groups tv crafting or travelling with you can try out new techniques like this wavy crochet stitch pattern striping and changing colours they re also economical and eco friendly made from leftover yarn and lasting for ages this colourful stripey version is fun to make and to use it s hard wearing and can be chucked in the washing if it needs freshening up it uses any dk cotton or bamboo in three colours i used rico essentials dk it doesn t need much of each colour so it s a good way to use up leftover yarn
